# Add form validation to Areas creation

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-11](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-11/add-form-validation-to-areas-creation)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Areas creation form lacks proper validation.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/AreasPage.tsx

**Issues:**

* No validation for area name (required)
* Area code not validated for format/uniqueness
* Floor number can be invalid
* Total units can be negative

**Expected Behavior:**

* Validate required fields
* Validate floor number is integer
* Validate total units is positive
* Show inline validation errors

**Priority:** Medium
